pullRequest.body:
We introduce some lemmas in `CategoryTheory/Subobject/Basic.lean` about the interaction of subobjects with the `CategoryTheory.IsPullback` API. Will be used in PR #22245.

---

PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

https://leanprover-community.github.io/contribute/index.html

In particular, note that most reviewers will only notice your PR
if it passes the continuous integration checks.
Please ask for help on https://leanprover.zulipchat.com if needed.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

If you are moving or deleting declarations, please include these lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Moves:
- Vector.* -> List.Vector.*
- ...

Deletions:
- Nat.bit1_add_bit1
- ...

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]

-->

<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh <optional_commit>

## more verbose report:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh long <optional_commit>
```
</details>

The doc-module for `script/declarations_diff.sh` contains some details about this script.

</details>

---

<details><summary>No changes to technical debt.</summary>

You can run this locally as
```
./scripts/technical-debt-metrics.sh pr_summary
```
* The `relative` value is the weighted *sum* of the differences with weight given by the *inverse* of the current value of the statistic.
* The `absolute` value is the `relative` value divided by the total sum of the inverses of the current values (i.e. the weighted *average* of the differences).
</details>

This PR/issue depends on:
* ~~leanprover-community/mathlib4#22378~~
By **[Dependent Issues](https://github.com/z0al/dependent-issues)** (🤖). Happy coding!
<!-- By Dependent Issues (Action) - DO NOT REMOVE -->

It would be slightly better to introduce first a `MonoOver` version of this, and deduce the `Subbobject` version from it:
```lean
def MonoOver.isoOfIsPullback {X Y Z : C} (S S' : MonoOver X)
    {f : X ⟶ Z} {g : Y ⟶ Z} {k : S.obj.left ⟶ Y} {k' : S'.obj.left ⟶ Y}
    (h : IsPullback k S.arrow g f) (h' : IsPullback k' S'.arrow g f) :
    S ≅ S' :=
  MonoOver.isoMk (IsPullback.isoIsPullback _ _ h h') (by simp)
```

I am currently trying to do that, but honestly the proof seems a lot more complex that needs to be. Here is my current strategy:
```lean
lemma isPullback_eq {X Y Z : C} {x x' : Subobject X}
    {f : X ⟶ Z} {g : Y ⟶ Z} {k : (x : C) ⟶ Y} {k' : (x' : C) ⟶ Y}
    (h : IsPullback k x.arrow g f) (h' : IsPullback k' x'.arrow g f) :
    x = x' := by
  induction' x using Quotient.inductionOn' with S
  induction' x' using Quotient.inductionOn' with S'
  let i : underlying.obj ⟦S⟧ ≅ S.obj.left := sorry
  let i' : underlying.obj ⟦S'⟧ ≅ S'.obj.left := sorry
  have h₁ : IsPullback (i.inv ≫ k) S.arrow g f := by
    sorry
  have h₂ : IsPullback (i'.inv ≫ k') S'.arrow g f := by
    sorry
  exact Quotient.sound ⟨MonoOver.isoOfIsPullback _ _ h₁ h₂⟩
```
The main pain point is the construction of the isomorphisms `i` and `i'`, which cannot be strenghtened into equalities because of choice.

I have simplified further my original proof:
```lean
lemma isPullback_eq {X Y Z : C} {x x' : Subobject X}
    {f : X ⟶ Z} {g : Y ⟶ Z} {k : (x : C) ⟶ Y} {k' : (x' : C) ⟶ Y}
    (h : IsPullback k x.arrow g f) (h' : IsPullback k' x'.arrow g f) :
    x = x' := by
  exact eq_of_comm (IsPullback.isoIsPullback _ _ h h') (by simp)
```
Compare to your proof of `MonoOver.isoOfIsPullback`, and we just swap `MonoOver.isoMk` with `eq_of_comm`.

pullRequest.title: feat(CategoryTheory/Subobject): add some lemmas wrt. the IsPullback API

`+ pullback_obj_representative`
<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh <optional_commit>

## more verbose report:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh long <optional_commit>
```
</details>

The doc-module for `script/declarations_diff.sh` contains some details about this script.

</details>

---

<details><summary>No changes to technical debt.</summary>

You can run this locally as
```
./scripts/technical-debt-metrics.sh pr_summary
```
* The `relative` value is the weighted *sum* of the differences with weight given by the *inverse* of the current value of the statistic.
* The `absolute` value is the `relative` value divided by the total sum of the inverses of the current values (i.e. the weighted *average* of the differences).
</details>

source.title: feat(CategoryTheory/IsPullback): add helper lemmas based on of_iso
